main event: An unusual incident involving a large, luminous object observed at treetop level near Shekhalin Island, Japan on 7 November 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 7 seconds., The object made an undulating motion and was silent., No comparison could be made with known aircraft., Three unidentified single engine jet aircraft were observed flying north towards Shekhalin, with one disintegrating mid-air., The weather conditions were clear with 10 miles visibility.
